The primary purpose of this study
T(1)AM, total T(3), and total T(4)
a novel HPLC tandem mass spectrometry assay
one healthy volunteer, 24 patients admitted to a cardiological ward, and 17 ambulatory patients suspected of thyroid disease
echocardiographic evidence of impaired left ventricular function
